title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1981, Gertrude M. Oppenheimer
1981, Cooper-Hewitt Museum
medium:
Medium: silk and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, marking cross, eyelet, stem, and satin stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Bands of alphabets, the inscription Half Moon Saratoga County NY, and scattered motifs.
name: Sampler
